details: The "Grant for Organizing Conference (GOC)" scheme by AICTE provides financial assistance to institutions for organizing conferences in various fields of technical education. Both Onsite Conferences and Online Conferences are supported.
benefits: Financial assistance to institutions for organizing conferences in various fields of technical education.
eligibility: Institutions with at least 10 years of existence (at least 5 years if the institute is located in a rural area)
The Institute shall have more than 50% admission for the past 3 years
The department applying should not have received the MODROB project in the last two years
application_process: Online submission of application by the institution
Applications received every two months will be processed in a single lot
Screening/ scrutiny of applications at Council
Evaluation of applications by the expert committee
The final decision will be taken by the Council, keeping in view the recommendations made by the experts and the availability of funds for the scheme
